attributes.action: to order the Department for Transport and the British Airports Authority to abandon plans to expand Heathrow airport by building a third runway.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the plans to be abandoned on a number of grounds.  In the present crisis of climate change this is a very short sighted plan.  Also, it is against the wishes of local residents who would suffer from the effects of increased traffic, environmental and noise pollution.
